> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nightlight followed Rodimus, feeling his arms around her was a bittersweet
> comfort eventhough he isnt the old ROdimus that she loved most, part of him
> still remains.
>
> After they left the command room and when they were walking in the
> corritors, she looked at Rodimus and said "What will happen now??
> Have you made a pact with him? have you planning to bring me here from the
> beginning?"

<NEW>

There was an odd look from DARK RODIMUS as he looked at NIGHTLIGHT,
"What do you mean?" he said as they walked there was a confused look
from him. "From the beginning of what?" He took her hand in his, "I
have loved you and will always love you."

DARK RODIMUS and NIGHTLIGHT stepped onto a lift and began moving to a
different floor. "I have always wanted you with me, but I will have to
get ELITA too. You will all be with me." he squeezed her hand, "Yes, I
want my wife and daughter with me, that is all that matters - even if
I have to exterminate all the Maximals to do it."

There was a Dark and wicked smile from DARK RODIMUS as the lift
continued to move down, further into the base that belonged to
MAGMATRON and his crew, quite possibly one of the greater enemies of
the Maximals.

(TAG)

Preston
